summary:
Making a pledge, taking a pledge
I‚Äôve been sitting with some strong negative feelings over the past few months.  My usual instinct would be to ascribe these feelings to external sources, to cut lengths of metaphorical yarn and tie them to each of the things that I think are making me feel this way.  But I know better: all experience is preceded by mind, led by mind, and made by mind...
title: Making a pledge, taking a pledge
